entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, described as having seen the most repulsive things.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts, brought out enormous boxes for the skrewts.

entities.name: skrewts
entities.description: The creatures that were being kept in the boxes, described as repulsive and rampaging.

relationships.description: Hagrid is responsible for taking care of the skrewts, but they do not appreciate being forced into boxes.
